uk.ac.aber.dcs.cs124.clg11.diag

Class RelationshipDiag

  • java.lang.Object
    • uk.ac.aber.dcs.cs124.clg11.diag.Drawable
      • uk.ac.aber.dcs.cs124.clg11.diag.RelationshipDiag

  • public class RelationshipDiag
extends Drawable
    GUI layer used to output/draw relationship diagram to the CanvasPanel. Retrieves data about classes and relationship from ClassDiagData & RelationshipDiagData objects. Stored of type 'RelationshipDiag' in VectorOfDrawables
    Author:
    Connor Goddard (clg11), Sam Jackson (slj11), Craig Heptinstall (crh13)

    • Field Summary

      • Fields inherited from class uk.ac.aber.dcs.cs124.clg11.diag.Drawable

        data, x, y

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      RelationshipDiag() 
      RelationshipDiag(ClassDiag a, ClassDiag b, String assocVar, String classAMulti, String classBMulti, String relType)
      Determines and sets the two classes to have the relationship drawn between including the relationship type and multiplicities

    • Method Summary

      Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      boolean contains(Drawable d)
      Determines whether the RelationshipDiagData object contains a reference to the selected classes
      String getArrowDir() 
      int getDiamondX() 
      int getDiamondY() 
      void paint(Graphics g)
      Determines what relationship type has been selected, and draws the relationship diagram between the two classes, using data retrieved from RelationshipDiagData) Includes automatic line drawing algorithm that allows relationship diagram to be automatically redrawn depending on the positions of the two related classes at any given time.

    • Constructor Detail

      • RelationshipDiag

        public RelationshipDiag()

      • RelationshipDiag

        public RelationshipDiag(ClassDiag a,
                ClassDiag b,
                String assocVar,
                String classAMulti,
                String classBMulti,
                String relType)
        Determines and sets the two classes to have the relationship drawn between including the relationship type and multiplicities
        Parameters:
        a - - First 'ClassDiag' object to draw relationship from
        b - - Second 'ClassDiag' object to draw relationship to
        assocVar - - Associated variable for relationship used in classes
        classAMulti - - Multiplicity value for first class
        classBMulti - - Multiplicity value for second class
        relType - - Relationship type (e.g. Inheritance, Aggregation etc..)

    • Method Detail

      • contains

        public boolean contains(Drawable d)
        Determines whether the RelationshipDiagData object contains a reference to the selected classes
        Parameters:
        d -
        Returns:
        contains - Boolean

      • paint

        public void paint(Graphics g)
        Determines what relationship type has been selected, and draws the relationship diagram between the two classes, using data retrieved from RelationshipDiagData) Includes automatic line drawing algorithm that allows relationship diagram to be automatically redrawn depending on the positions of the two related classes at any given time.
        Specified by:
        paint in class Drawable
        See Also:
        Drawable.paint(java.awt.Graphics)
